text: Romi Spada was a Swiss bobsledder who competed in the early 1950s. He won a silver medal in the four-man event at the 1950 FIBT World Championships in Cortina d'Ampezzo. ==References== *Bobsleigh four-man world championship medalists since 1930 Category:Swiss male bobsledders Category:Possibly living people Category:Year of birth missing
title: Romi Spada
